title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 251.10 - Determination of representatives on consent
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 251.10 - Determination of representatives on consent

State Regulations

Subject to the approval of the director of PEPR, the
parties to a representation proceeding may agree on the method by which the
board shall determine the question of representation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
251.10

Renumbered from 251.17

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
